title: Sarong, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: A sarong with cream ground and highly conventionalized large-scale floral and foliate design in blue, white, and brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sarong, 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. 1937-93-3.
